short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Q - prev ep; E - next ep

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple chrome extension witch allows to navigate foward and back on timecodes from description.

In addition you can remove on video popups: rewind and episode name.

How to use: 
    E - to next timecode
    Q - to previous timecode

Works on old videous without episodes functionality but with timecodes in description.

Source code on gihub: https://github.com/sramoslovec/YoutubeEpisodeHotkeysChromeExt
